attributes.action: Pets should receive the same equal health care & medical treatment as humans do.
attributes.background: Fleas are affecting my cat. I'm unable to give my cat any flea treatment as the vets are not opened on the weekend. I don’t know what to do as it is the first time I am experiencing it. The fleas are spreading in my house and are affecting my little siblings. Vets should be opened 7 days a week.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. At the moment, it's the responsibility of vets surgeries to decide on their own opening hours.
